title: The Download: introducing our 35 Innovators Under 35 list for 2025
optimized_headline: Meet the 35 Innovators Under 35 Shaping the Future in 2025
raw_excerpt: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. Introducing: our 35 Innovators Under 35 list for 2025 The world is full of extraordinary young people brimming with ideas for how to crack tough problems. Every year, we recognize 35 such individuals…
raw_body: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. Introducing: our 35 Innovators Under 35 list for 2025 The world is full of extraordinary young people brimming with ideas for how to crack tough problems. Every year, we recognize 35 such individuals…
speedrun: The Download has unveiled its 35 Innovators Under 35 list for 2025, spotlighting young talents tackling significant challenges. These innovators come from diverse fields, showcasing creativity and problem-solving skills. Their work could influence technology and society in meaningful ways. Recognizing these individuals now highlights the potential for fresh ideas to shape our future.
why_it_matters: This recognition could inspire young innovators, encouraging them to pursue their ideas and make a difference.
Highlighting these innovators reflects a broader trend of valuing youth-led innovation in technology and society.

lenses.eli12: The 35 Innovators Under 35 list showcases young people making a difference with their ideas. Think of it like a spotlight on the brightest stars in a night sky, each shining in their own way. This matters because it shows that new voices can change the world we live in.
lenses.pm: For product managers and founders, this list highlights emerging talent that could shape future trends. Understanding these innovators' ideas may reveal user needs and market gaps. Engaging with their work could lead to fresh insights and opportunities for collaboration.
lenses.engineer: From a technical perspective, the Innovators Under 35 list showcases individuals who are pushing the boundaries of technology. Many are working with advanced models and methodologies that could lead to breakthroughs in their fields. This recognition emphasizes the importance of innovation in driving progress and efficiency.
